id: # §77-78 freeze notices are published in the Official Gazette (Reshumot).
# There is no live API for freeze notices.
# Each row represents one freeze notice. Columns:
#   helka_list     — Semicolon-separated helka numbers (empty = all helkot in gush)
#   applies_to_all — true/false (full freeze blocks all permits)
#   density_cap    — Max units/dunam if freeze_type=RIGHTS_REDUCTION (empty otherwise)
#   polygon_wkt    — Optional WKT polygon of freeze area (EPSG:4326)
#   source_url     — URL to Official Gazette publication
